lead_paragraph: Davis, an All-Pro linebacker who broke his right forearm in Sunday’s victory in the N.F.C. title game, may need to wear a brace, Coach Ron Rivera said.
snippet: Davis, an All-Pro linebacker who broke his right forearm in Sunday’s victory in the N.F.C. title game, may need to wear a brace, Coach Ron Rivera said.

headline.main: Panthers’ Thomas Davis Has Surgery but Is Expected to Play
headline.print_headline: Panthers’ Davis Has Surgery, but He Is Expected to Play

abstract: NFL Roundup; Carolina Panthers linebacker Thomas Davis undergoes surgery for broken arm but will likely able to play in Super Bowl; other football news noted.
